name: Red Tide (sermer)
description:
The first game I ever made, including the never released final dlc patch(cause my old computer broke)!

Tap or hold left click to control where the shark will swim. The shark will swim up and down towards the point that you are touching.

Eating fish will refill your hunger bar and keep you from starving. It will also earn you points that you can spend in the store.

There are four sections that you can make it to(based on distance swam). Further sections will net you more cash but the shark will swim faster and you will get hungry faster.

Enjoy!
